snippet: Peter J. Kiernan, who was chief counsel for Gov. David A. Paterson, sought state work for his law firm less than two years after leaving his official post.
abstract: Peter J Kiernan, lawyer who served as chief counsel for former New York State Gov David A Paterson, pays $3,500 fine for violating state law limiting interactions between former employees of the governor's office and state government.
lead_paragraph: Peter J. Kiernan, who was chief counsel for Gov. David A. Paterson, sought state work for his law firm less than two years after leaving his official post.

headline.seo: Ex-Counsel to Gov. David Paterson Fined Over Ethics Law Violation
headline.main: Former Counsel to Paterson Is Fined on an Ethics Law Violation
headline.print_headline: Former Counsel to Paterson Is Fined on an Ethics Law Violation
